name: Come Home, Wolf
description:
"You are older. But you have gotten so much smaller."

Consider this a familiar future... Welcome to Amseng, child of the moon. Your work contract in the stars has finished and it's time for you to return to planetside living. An old friend is waiting to welcome you to your new home at their wolf kin township. But six years on lycanthropy suppression drug Lygone has left you completely alienated from other werewolves like yourself and their way of life. It's going to take a lot of work to figure out what your future is supposed to be. What kind of wolf will you become?

Developed as part of Werewolf Jam 2023!

Evie - Programming, Game Design (https://evie.zone/) 

Sarah Zedig - Writing, Narrative Design (https://comradery.co/sarahzedig) 

Névé - Character Design and Pop-Up Artwork, Cutscene Illustration, In-Game Icons (https://the.beesneevs.com/) (https://twitter.com/neevspoilsbees) 

Fen - Concept Art, Sprites (https://noonmarkart.carrd.co/) 

Ianaro - Voice Acting & Sound Design (https://ianarovoices.carrd.co/)

How to play: Use the WASD keys to move your character, scroll wheel to zoom in and out. Click on icons above characters to talk to them.
